value:
The Order of Heroes, a different
world... This is like a dream,
and it's more than I can fathom now.

I'm a fisherman's son, from a little
island called Novis.$k$pWith two brothers, life wasn't easy for
my family, so I ended up at the Priory.

I've seen how hard you work. Be
careful with that. Work too hard, and
you'll wear yourself out.$k$pThen nothing will get done.

When I need calm, I just go and look
at the sea. But now that I'm here in
this world, how do I even find it?$k$pMaybe you can take me.

I was just reading my grimoire.
If I don't keep my studies up,
I'm going to hear it from Nomah.

I bring greetings from
$Nf.$k$pThat's all I got.

Nice! I can celebrate a little now,
can't I?
No better than adequate.

Need to try again... And study harder
next time.

Knowing you believe in me makes
me feel like I'll become even stronger.

I'm Boey, a mage. I usually try to
avoid problematic situations. You
called me here, so...so much for that.

My family... Well, I'll be honest with
you. We were poor as poor gets,
so off to the priory I went.$k$pThey said I had a talent for magic.
Don't get me wrong. I didn't suffer
over it. But I did wonder...$k$pIf I was born somewhere else, what
would my life have been like? I gave
up thinking about it. There's no point.$k$pBut then I was summoned here—a
world full of different people. Fighting
alongside them has been great.$k$pAnd I have to thank you for that.
We've been together for a long time
now. You're not just someone I know.$k$pNow...I think of you more like...family.
たあっ
There!
Darn it!
うわあああーっ！！
Have some of this!
Sorry, friend.
Out of the way!
It's over!
That...hurt.
Hehheh
Looking for something?
Cut it out! What are we, kids?
I see how it's going to be.
I wonder how everyone's doing back at home.
Me and Mae? We're just stuck with each other. We've been together since we were kids.
I do what needs to be done. That's all there is to it.
Now that I think about it, spending time with you isn't so bad.
OK.
Huh...
Let's go!
